wikipedia_page.main: Kofi Omar Josephs (born 13 September 1991) is a British basketball player in the British Basketball League for Plymouth City Patriots. He also plays for the British national team.

response: *On January 3, Breiðablik announced it had signed Jameel McKay and Kofi Josephs to replace Christian Covile and Jure Gunjina.
The club has produced many professional players, most notably Great Britain internationals Myles Hesson and Kofi Josephs.https://cobbasketball.co.uk/history/cob-roll-of-honour/
